solution.text:
No. of Orange balls \(=_{m}_\)
No. of Green balls \(=_{l}_\)
Probability of drawing a Green ball \(=\frac {No.\,of\,green\,balls}{Total\,balls}\)
\(= \frac{_{l}_}{_{j}_+_{k}_+_{l}_+_{m}_}\)
\(=\frac {_{l}_}{_{{j+k+l+m}}_}\)
Probability that the ball drawn is not green = \(1-\) probability of drawing a green ball
\(=1-\frac {_{l}_}{_{{j+k+l+m}}_}\)
\(=\frac {_{{j+k+m}}_}{_{{j+k+l+m}}_}\)
\(=_{{Fraction(j+k+m,j+k+l+m)}}_\)

content.text: Find the probability that the ball drawn is not green?
